tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE access_permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permission_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    permission_description TEXT,
    access_level_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (access_level_id) REFERENCES blockchain_participants(participant_id)
);
CREATE TABLE permissions (permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, access_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password_hash VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE roles (role_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_participants (participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, permission_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY(permission_id) REFERENCES permissions(permission_id));
